ygData.subject: Re: Dark Reaver
ygData.msgSnippet: I definitely think that this sword would be 2 handed, because what shadow knights do you know of that use 1 handed slashing? Tulwump, Level 4 Troll SK, Fennin
ygData.messageBody:
I definitely think that this sword would be 2 handed, because what shadow knights do you know of that use 1 handed slashing?

Tulwump, Level 4 Troll SK, Fennin Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: David [SMTP:david1ap@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 3:32 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Re: Dark Reaver

Heh, ure right, this list is pretty quite. I am the list owner (as u all
should know ;) and i also subscribe to the magicians list and they are at least
50 emails a day.

As for the sword, this is my first time hearing about it. If ne one know
anything please send info to list, greatly appreciated.

I like ure initiative Darrin. I might need a co moderater, and I need more ppl
to bring up topics and such, so if ne one thinks they can help make the list
better, email me.

"King, Darrin" wrote:

> From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>
> Since the list is very quiet, my dark brethren, here's a topic to reanimate
> it:
>
> The Dark Reaver
>
> Our powerful, SK only sword. One handed or 2, now in Final?
>
